attachments.title: Physics-based Animation | Android Developers
attachments.text: Physics-based animation uses the fundamentals of physics, force and velocity, to build animations.

text: a little frustrating that they keep going back and forth between Animation and Animator. I wonder how well these play with view properties.

used to have issues where you would use an animation to change the location of a button on-screen, but it’s properties wouldn’t change, so clicking on it had no effect and clicking where it used to be would perform the click. Wonder if that’s going to be the same for the physics-based animations.
